data.text: @SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Iran's revolution will succeed — with or without American help. The question is: will you be remembered as an ally or a bystander? Choose wisely. ACT NOW.!!#IranMassacre #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC #IranRevolution2026

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Every deal tells the regime: keep killing, we'll keep negotiating. Iranians REJECT that message. Do you? #IranMassacre #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithIRGC #NoDealWithMullahs

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Senator, be remembered as the one who helped free Iran. Not the one who watched it burn. Push for military action. Support the revolution. NOW. #NoDealWithMullahs #IranRevolution2026 #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre‌ #NoDealWithIRGC

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The Islamic Republic doesn't represent Iran. It STOPS Iran. Iranians reject deals with torturers. END THIS REGIME. #NoDealWithMullahs #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithIRGC #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The Islamic Republic doesn't represent Iran. It KILLS Iran. Iranians reject deals with torturers. END THIS REGIME. #NoDealWithMullahs #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithIRGC #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Every negotiation with the Islamic Republic funds executions, prisons, and terror. Iranians are AGAINST it. Be on the right side please!!! #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026 #NoDealWithIRGC

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The mullahs use every pause to regroup, reload, and kill more. No pauses. No negotiations. Constant pressure. Military options active. UNTIL THEY FALL.!!#NoDealWithMullahs #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithIRGC #IRGCTerrorists

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton Iran's people are ready to fight. They need weapons, not words. They need air support, not empty promises. Be the ally they deserve. ACT NOW. #RezaPahlaviForIran #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026 #NoDealWithMullahs

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The IRGC is a terrorist organization killing civilians daily. Designations aren't enough. Destroy their infrastructure. Support the revolution. END THIS REGIME. #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The Islamic Republic threatens to close Hormuz. Threatens to attack Israel. Threatens Americans daily. ENOUGH THREATS. Time for American action. STRIKE THEM!!. #IranRevolution2026 #IranMassacre #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC
